product_name: Ibex Mad River Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: You don't need an excuse to add the Ibex Mad River women's jacket to your winter wardrobe rotation. It's gorgeously styled with a versatile, modern cut and sleek mini-houndstooth wool fabric. As if that isn't enough, this lovely jacket features warm PrimaLoft(R) Eco synthetic insulation; slim and cozy, it warms you even if it gets wet. Wool manages moisture, regulates core temperature and repels odors naturally; wool is also recyclable and biodegradable. Recycled polyester lining glides easily over clothing and is very comfortable. Full-length front zipper has a snap-down placket to seal out the weather; two exposed snaps at collar. Cuffs have two exposed snap closures that match the neck snaps. Dry clean the Ibex Mad River jacket. Closeout.
short_description: You don't need an excuse to add the Ibex Mad River women's jacket to your winter wardrobe rotation. It's gorgeously styled with a versatile, modern cut and sleek mini-houndstooth wool fabric.
